QuestData.Title: Head of the Snake
QuestData.Description: They taught us at officers camp to always cut off the head of the snake. Seemed dumb considering we never fought any snakes, but I guess it kind of makes sense now.$B$BTake your men in there and kill Lord Kassarus.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The bigger they are, the bigger the bomb you use on them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Lord Kassarus in the Temple of Zin-Malor.
QuestData.CompletionText: You look to still be in one piece.
QuestData.RewardText: Glad you're on our side, soldier.
